info.title: ScoreSaber Public API
info.description:
ScoreSaber's Public API

Please note this API is in constant development and is subject to change, so if there are any errors please dont hesitate to contact us.

The current global rate limit is set at a pretty high 400 requests per minute, if for some reason you need higher than this please contact us with your reasoning and we may be able to supply you with special access

get.summary: Get a list of leaderboards based on filters

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Which category to sort by (0 = trending, date ranked = 1, scores set = 2, star difficulty = 3, author = 4)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Which direction to sort (0 = descending, 1 = ascending)

parameters.name: unique
parameters.description: Only return one leaderboard of each id

get.summary: Gets leaderboard information by ScoreSaber leaderboardId
Gets leaderboard information by map hash
Gets leaderboard scores by ScoreSaber leaderboardId

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Filter by ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code (comma delimitered)

get.summary: Gets leaderboard scores by map hash

parameters.name: countries

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The amount of scores to return
